metadata.name: Puffer 01
metadata.description:
Digi Puffers are collection of 10 Animated NFTs created keeping the limitless boundaries and endless expressionism of digital fabric.

In simple words,this collection represents different moods with fashion and digital design

And no they donot have "value addition" theyre just art pieces that came from within and have been executed in the purest sense. 

Although 4K wallpapers for the desktop and phone are always available! :D
